item.title: Install Config
item.author: Victor Ma
item.description: Installation download Go itself for windows and install, confirm with go version after. 1 go version go1.20.1 windows/amd64 Use “go help doc” for more information about doc command, for example. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 > go doc json.Decoder.Decode package json // import "encoding/json" func (dec *Decoder) Decode(v any) error Decode reads the next JSON-encoded value from its input and stores it in the value pointed to by v.
